version_description:
Added Crash casino game.
Added NEW Special Cases.
Check out the full changelog at http://kommadot.games/casechase/changelog

- Complete game reskin
- Ability to sort item inventory to categories
- Updated database with new Clutch case and lot of new custom cases
- Premium Membership
- Daily rewards
- New upgrades
- Cloud Save
- Player profile
- Game balance fixes
- Bug fixes

- added Horizon case
- added new Sticker Capsules with rare stickers
- possibility to sell multiple or all items at once (mass sell)
- you can now apply stickers to weapons
- improved inventory filter
- redesigned some dialogues
- improved performance and stability

- Case Battle mode
- New Danger Zone Case and skins
- Emerald, Ruby, Black pearl and Sapphire skin patterns
- In game shop redesign
- Major bug and stability fixes

- Added drop probabilities for shop and special cases
- Changed in game currency to gold
- Added new upgrade for case drop in clicker
- Minor bug fixes

- Added new Prisma cases and skins
- New upgrades
- Tutorial for new players
- Minor UI changes
- Optimization and bug fixes

- Added new achievements system
- Statistics moved to profile dialog
- Added daily offer to market
- Added multiple new translations
- New ranks, up to rank 100
- A lot of bug fixes and optimizations

- Added new CS20 skins, cases and sticker capsule
- Added ability to change chips back to gold
- Fixed translations bugs
- Improved quality and stability of the game

- Added Shattered web case
- Added Norse, Canals and St. Marc collections and skins
- Added chicken and feral predators sticker capsules
- Added new knives
- Fixed bot Kyle rare bug when he rewards negative money
- Fixed random cases -1 count bug
- Fixed bug when in chips jackpot bots could bet more than 500k max bet
- Translation fixes
- Other small optimization and bug fixes

Welcome to the latest version of Case Chase.
Here is what's new:

- New case open reward message design
- New ingame shop design
- Notch support
- Major bug fixes and improvements

Welcome to the latest version of Case Chase.
Here is what's new:

- Added new Fracture Case
- Storage units
- Added upgrades for casino
- Item locking system
- In game chat rooms
- Added max button for market when buying cases
- Option to sort inventory by float value
- Engine update and major bug fixes

Welcome to the latest version of Case Chase.
Here is what's new:

- Added new CSGO cases and collections
- Economy updates
- Added animations
- Bugfixes and improvemens

Welcome to the latest version of Case Chase.
Here is what's new:
- IOS 14 support
- Engine update

- Minor bug fixes
- Minor stabilty improvemens

Welcome to the latest version of Case Chase.
Here is what's new:
- Added Snakebite Case
- Added Poorly Drawn Capsule
- Engine update
- Major bug fixes

Welcome to the latest version of Case Chase.
Here is what's new:
- Improved case opening
- Sounds and music updates
- Engine update
- Major bug fixes
